lines.text: To hell with that, let's go!
As a judge, I'm always interested in the exact moment when someone's argument falls apart.
I was thinking I'd call her Mathilda
I will give you the deed to my house not to call her that.
When you turn a gift away from your door, it goes to the one who takes it in.
So, who did you vote for?

[teasingly]
Well, I just couldn't make up my mind...
As a judge, I'm always interested in the exact moment when someone's argument falls apart.
To hell with that, let's go!
